title: Weather DashBoard
description: Developed a weather DashBoard that fetches the real time data from a public API

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Swarn Jewellers is a sleek, responsive e-commerce website built using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features a user-friendly interface to browse, view, and add premium jewellery items to the cart, offering a smooth and elegant shopping experience

title: Chat DashBoard
description: Our React Chat App features a user-friendly and interactive interface designed for seamless communication. It enables real-time messaging using Socket.IO, ensuring instant message delivery and live updates across users. With responsive design, dynamic message rendering, and smooth UI transitions, it offers a modern and engaging chat experience.

title: Style Me
description: Style-Me is an AI-powered virtual try-on project that allows users to visualize themselves in new outfits before making a purchase. By uploading their image, users can see how different clothes from e-commerce sites would look on them in real-time. Additionally, the platform enables users to design and preview their own custom fashion creations, offering a personalized and immersive shopping experience.
